multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the purpose of using a csv.DictReader instead of a csv.reader?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: It allows you to automatically access column names and values using dictionary syntax.
It is faster than using a csv.reader.
It allows you to write to CSV files.
It is more secure than using a csv.reader.
